title: Jordan Peterson & Matt Ridley, Shellenberger's Nukes, and Pirsig on Technological Quality
description: Obviously technology has improved things, but some people don't thing so at all, even others want things to go back to how they were before the Industrial Revolution. But there certainly are major problems with technology as it is, and if we let reason dominate and ignore Quality, we will not only continue to see serious problems, but we allow for anti-technological cults to take hold because they provide what reasonable technology lacks.
